H0.text: In 2006 Monty Panesar became the first person of what religion to play test cricket for England. Hindu

H1.text: In 2006 Monty Panesar became the first person of what religion to play test cricket for England. Buddhist

H2.text: In 2006 Monty Panesar became the first person of what religion to play test cricket for England. Jain

H3.text: In 2006 Monty Panesar became the first person of what religion to play test cricket for England. Sihk

A4.text: Panesar is a Sikh, and so he wears a black patka while playing and training.

A5.text: the first Sikh to play Test cricket for England.
